sentence: What makes you think that a US President has the right to seize banks and nationalize them?

meta_info: ::id bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8890103_0098.11 ::date 2015-12-25T12:48:58 ::annotator UCO-AMR-05 ::preferred # ::snt The reason that the US has always attracted foreign investment is that we are a nation of laws in which the owners of private companies are protected from arbitrary "seizures" of their assets by the government. # ::save-date Tue Dec 29, 2015 ::file bolt-eng-DF-170-181103-8890103_0098_11.txt
sentence: The reason that the US has always attracted foreign investment is that we are a nation of laws in which the owners of private companies are protected from arbitrary "seizures" of their assets by the government.
